ygData.subject: Re: Illigeble Scoll and Rondo
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree with Deron, posting statements to the list like this one is not necessary. ... The post from Dan Alexander was the only post that needed to be made
ygData.messageBody:
I agree with Deron, posting statements to the list like this one is not
necessary.

>From: "Mikaela" <mikaela@...>
>
>I did not open the attachment to Linds' email and did not get the worm. I
>never open attachments from these list for this very reason.

The post from Dan Alexander was the only post that needed to be made about
the virus, since it gave valuable information about the virus and how not to
get it, etc.
Imagine if all the subscribers to the list posted a message stating that
they did not open the attachment......

Hopefully the subject will go back to Questing.



-----Original Message-----
From: Mikaela [mailto:mikaela@...]
Sent: Friday, July 02, 1999 1:18 AM
To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] Illigeble Scoll and Rondo

From: "Mikaela" <mikaela@...>

Lighten up Deron....a virus is a pretty serious matter for everyone who
subscribes to this list. I, for one, would more than welcome information
from someone on how to remove it from my system if I had been infected. If
your entire hard drive is wiped out, you won't be able to get ANY quest
information.

Mikaela of The Rathe
mikaela@...

-----Original Message-----
From: Deron Graham <Clutch@...>
To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com <EQ-Quest@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, July 01, 1999 7:05 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] Illigeble Scoll and Rondo


>From: "Deron Graham" <Clutch@...>
>
>Do you perhaps some information about a quest? I thought this list was
>about questing, and not about some ramblings that have nothing to do with
>the topic.
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Mikaela [mailto:mikaela@...]
>Sent: Thursday, July 01, 1999 12:28 AM
>To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] Illigeble Scoll and Rondo
>
>From: "Mikaela" <mikaela@...>
>
>I did not open the attachment to Linds' email and did not get the worm. I
>never open attachments from these list for this very reason.
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Dan Alexander <dalex@...>
>To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com <EQ-Quest@onelist.com>
>Cc: j_baouns@... <j_baouns@...>
>Date: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 10:44 AM
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] Illigeble Scoll and Rondo
>
>
>>From: Dan Alexander <dalex@...>
>>
>>Jimmy, you're infected with a virus called Happy99. It secretly sends out
>>a copy of itself when you email someone. In this case, it sent itself to
>>everyone on the EQ-Quest mailing list. Visit www.mcafee.com, get a virus
>>scanner, and run it to disinfect yourself.
>>
>>Subscribers, scan your harddrive for a file attachment called happy99.exe
>>and delete it. *Do not run it.*
>>
>>-Pennaggolan
>>
>>
>>At 09:22 AM 06/30/1999, you wrote:
>>>From: "Jimmy Lind" <j_baouns@...>
>>>
>>>
>>>Attachment Converted: "C:\TEMP\Happy99.exe"
>>>
>>>

>>>

>>>http://www.onelist.com

>>>
